TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeServerStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeServerStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream
.class public auto ansi sealed NamedPipeServerStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream

summary.span: 公开命名管道周围的 ，该管道既支持同步读写操作，也支持异步读写操作。

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Named pipes 提供单向或双工管道，用于在管道服务器与一个或多个管道客户端之间进行通信。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 命名管道可用于在本地或通过网络进行进程间通信。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 单个管道名称可由多个 对象共享。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何进程都可以充当命名管道服务器或客户端，也可以同时充当这两者。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用命名管道将字符串从父进程发送到同一计算机上的子进程的方法。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 此示例在具有 值 的父进程中创建一个 对象。This example creates a object in a parent process with a value of . 服务器随后将等待子进程中的 对象连接到该对象。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此示例中，两个进程都在同一台计算机上，并且 对象的 值为 。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接下来，父进程将用户提供的字符串发送给子进程。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 此字符串将显示在控制台中。The string is displayed to the console. 此示例适用于使用 类的服务器进程。This example is for the server process, which uses the class. 有关完整的代码示例（包括管道客户端和服务器的代码），请参阅[如何：使用命名管道进行网络进程间通信](/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication)。For the entire code example, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](/dotnet/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

summary.span: 断开当前连接。

span.span: Disconnects the current connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法将被阻止，直到所有发送的字符都已读取，除非管道的传输模式设置为 并且在创建 对象的构造函数中设置了缓冲区大小。Calling the method will block until all the sent characters have been read unless the transmission mode of the pipe is set to and the buffer size is set in the constructor that created the object. 在这种情况下，不会接收到所有消息。In this case, not all of the messages will be received. 调用 会导致服务器发生阻塞，直到从管道中读取所有数据。Calling causes the server to block until all the data has been read from the pipe.

span.span: No pipe connections have been made yet.
-or-
The connected pipe has already disconnected.
-or-
The pipe handle has not been set.
The pipe is closed.

summary.span: 获取管道另一端的客户端用户名。

span.span: Gets the user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

returns.span: 管道另一端的客户端用户名。

span.span: The user name of the client on the other end of the pipe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果客户端尚未写入管道，或连接的客户端未与 的 连接，则 方法返回 `null`。The method returns `null` if the client has not yet written to the pipe or if the connected client did not connect with a of . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个方法，该方法用于创建可响应多个并发客户端请求的管道服务器，以及用于客户端模拟的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 此示例在父进程中创建一个 对象，该对象随后会创建多个等待 对象连接的线程。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 客户端在连接后，将向服务器提供文件名，并读取该文件的内容并将其发送回客户端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 由于 在打开文件时模拟客户端，因此客户端只能请求具有足够权限打开的文件。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: No pipe connections have been made yet.
-or-
The connected pipe has already disconnected.
-or-
The pipe handle has not been set.
The pipe is closed.
The pipe connection has been broken.
-or-

exception.span: 客户端用户名的长度超过了 19 个字符。

span.span: The user name of the client is longer than 19 characters.

summary.span: 模拟客户端时调用委托。

span.span: Calls a delegate while impersonating the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 连接客户端的权限将应用到远程服务器。The connecting client's permissions are applied to the remote server. 例如，如果连接客户端尝试请求服务器上的文件的内容，则客户端只会请求具有足够权限打开的文件。For example, if the connecting client tries to request the contents of a file on the server, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个方法，该方法用于创建可响应多个并发客户端请求的管道服务器，以及用于客户端模拟的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to create a pipe server that can respond to multiple simultaneous client requests, and a method for client impersonation. 此示例在父进程中创建一个 对象，该对象随后会创建多个等待 对象连接的线程。This example creates a object in a parent process, which then creates multiple threads that wait for objects to connect. 客户端在连接后，将向服务器提供文件名，并读取该文件的内容并将其发送回客户端。After a client is connected, it supplies a file name to the server and the contents of that file are read and sent back to the client. 由于 在打开文件时模拟客户端，因此客户端只能请求具有足够权限打开的文件。Because the impersonates the client when opening the file, the client can request only files that it has sufficient permissions to open. [!code-cpp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cpp/program.cpp#01)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_ImpersonationSample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: No pipe connections have been made yet.
-or-
The connected pipe has already disconnected.
-or-
The pipe handle has not been set.
The pipe is closed.
The pipe connection has been broken.
-or-
An I/O error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法会导致 对象在客户端连接之前被阻止。Calling this method causes the object to block until a client connects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用命名管道将字符串从父进程发送到子进程的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 此示例在父进程中创建一个 对象。This example creates a object in a parent process. 此对象的 值为 ，然后在 对象与 对象建立连接之前进行阻止。This object has a value of , which then blocks until a object establishes a connection to the object. 此示例是为 和 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeServerStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此方法是异步的，因此此方法会立即返回，但当客户端调用 或 时，将完成连接过程。Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls or .

summary.span: 异步等待客户端连接到该 对象并监视取消请求。

span.span: Asynchronously waits for a client to connect to this object and monitors cancellation requests.

returns.span: 表示异步等待操作的任务。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous wait operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于此方法是异步的，因此此方法会立即返回，但当客户端调用 或 时，将完成连接过程。Because it is asynchronous, this method returns immediately, but the connection process is completed when the client calls or . 使用取消标记的取消请求仅适用于使用管道选项值 创建的 对象，或者如果在调用 方法之前发生了取消，则为。Cancellation requests using the cancellation token will only work if the object was created with a pipe option value of or if the cancellation occurs before the method is called.
